title: How NFL Scheme Changes Affect Fantasy Football | The Dantasy Football Podcast (Ep. 276)
description:
The Ringer’s Danny Kelly and Danny Heifetz dig in to what a few major scheme changes for mean for fantasy football in 2018. The Dannies break down the Titans’ new-look offense under Matt LaFleur and why it gives Marcus Mariota a strong chance to bounce back (02:00). They then take a look at the Bears’ offensive overhaul (18:00) before diving in to why Eli Manning will maximize Saquon Barkley's and Odell Beckham Jr.'s potential and how Pat Shurmur can make the Giants fantasy relevant again this year (34:00).
